isis.stitle: 13 SPEED AND 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-713/18 SERIES - ASSEMBLE - SYNCHRONIZER ASSEMBLY

note.para: Pins on the LO range synchronizer must line up with the chamfered holes on the sliding clutch bottom.

caution.para: When compressing the HI range synchronizer springs, cover with a shop rag. In the event compression is not achieved the first time, this prevents the springs from leaving the bench area.

step1.para: Place the larger LO range synchronizer ring face down (with pins up) on a bench ( Figure 191).

figure.caption: Figure 191. Place Sliding Clutch on LO Range Synchronizer Pins

step1.para: With the sliding clutch recessed side up, place the sliding clutch on the LO range synchronizer pins ( Figure 191).
In the HI range synchronizer bores, install the three (3) springs ( Figure 192).

figure.caption: Figure 192. Install Springs in HI Range Synchronizer Bores

step1.para: Place the HI range synchronizer ring over the LO range synchronizer ring. Rotate the HI range synchronizer until the springs are seated against the pins ( Figure 193).

figure.caption: Figure 193. Place HI Range Synchronizer Ring Over LO Range Synchronizer Ring

step1.para: Cover the assembly with a shop rag.
Apply downward pressure to the HI range synchronizer ring while twisting counterclockwise ( Figure 194). This compresses the springs to fully seat HI range on the LO range synchronizer.

figure.caption: Figure 194. Apply Pressure to HI Range Synchronizer Ring

note.para: Make sure you can move the sliding clutch from HI to LO range and back.
